page.title: 10MRS LISTER'S DAY
page.content: Tuesday 9th July 1985. Started 4am, Woke Mr.Lister for work baby disturbed,settled her down. played peekaboo with Alice. 5.30am. Got up,let out dogs & cats. Filled kettle,changed baby's nappy. Prepared breakfast for children, cornflakes,Ricekrispies & Weetabix. Woke up Sarah & Simon, emptied cat litter trays & put washing in machine,changed fluid in baby sterilizer.Ate breakfast,washed & dressed.7.00 am milked goats,put milk to cool in fridge,Sarah fed & watered other animals. 8.45 took children to school in car went to Postoffice & the Fruit market. Also went to Spar & talked, then went home, unloaded shopping ,collected washing, Alice went to sleep,put kettle on.Spent until lunch trimming dogs for clients.
